flawed_nl_solution:
It takes 3*20=<<3*20=60>>60 minutes to clean the living room
So it is 60/60=<<60/60=1>>1 hour
The bathroom takes 1*2=<<1*2=2>>2 hours
So all together the inside takes 1+1+2=<<1+1+2=3>>3 hours
The outside takes 3*2=<<3*2=6>>6 hours
So the chores take 3+6=<<3+6=9>>9 hours
He splits it 1+2=<<1+2=3>>3 ways
So he works 9/3=<<9/3=3>>3 hours
